item.title: Git Cheatsheet
item.description: Introduction I record some useful tips and skills on working with git. Submodule How to prevent it switching to a detached HEAD on updating the submodule It can be fixed by setting the remote tracking branch with git submodule set-branch -b <branch name> <submodule path>. The <branch> name should not contain the remote repo alias. E.g., the command of git submodule set-branch -d main vim will make the submodule vim track the changes of remote main branch.

2023年年度计划 自我提升 专业技术 Backend Engineer (Reference Guide of Technology Stack for Backend Engineer) Output: tech blog, project Language Low-level system programming Go Rust Functional programming Elixir Ruby (work requirement) Architecture Microservice DDD Design Patterns Clean Code Middleware / Shared Components PostgreSQL Redis Kafka Kong Cloud-Native kubernetes DevOps Github Actions GitOps OpenTelemetry Tools Doom Emacs 人文修养 Output：读书笔记 思维方法论 麦肯锡思维 职业发展 professional career ladder
